comment: Such an amazing, kind, caring, helpful, fun, and informative professor. Take her, you won't regret it

highly recommend. The information you learn in this class is very important and applicable. Homework is sometimes fun & engaging but other times it feels redundant.Modules with 1 quiz and a written thing that sucks but straightforward.Workload is easy to spread out and complete but is far too extra for the class, but her lectures are fun

Professor Campbell is amazing! She was so kind and warm every single class. I took her during the Covid online time and she was always making sure we were all doing okay with the craziness. HIGHLY recommend her!
No midterm or final. Most of your grade comes from online guided readings and quizzes that you can probably find a quizlet for on the internet. Attendance is mandatory though.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Lecture heavy

comment: THE BEST WELLNESS PROFESSOR YOU'RE GOING TO GET!!! Literally it was the best professor ever! Shes so dope! super understanding and offers so many modifications if you need it. Always available through text! I left her class learning a lot about myself and with a second family.

She had a bad habit of just telling us stories or letting other students speak about random topics rather than actually teaching the subject. That comes back to get you when you have to take the midterm and final because she's not even the one who decides on the questions. I had to borrow notes from a friend in another class, otherwise I'd fail.

Professor Campbell is such a caring woman. She wants this class to be enjoyable by all students. She always asked for our input on what we wanted to study or what physical activities we wanted to do. She keeps the class engaged and teaches the material in such a fun way. Homework & quizzes are online & not too difficult if you do the guided reading
Ms. Campbell is SO sweet! I took yoga as a buffer class, and it quickly became my favorite class! She offers tons of moderations, teaches meditation, and is always willing to talk. I love her!

I LOVE Mrs. Campbell. She loves to ask for our opinion and feedback on everything and makes the lectures really fun. We usually talks about society and health/nutrition and everything going on in the world and relationships and random stuff. You have to do modules throughout the course but theyre super easy. Only 2 tests, midterm and final.

Mrs. Campbell was such an amazing professor! I took her for Intro to Yoga and loved the class! This professor was VERY outgoing, positive, and full of energy. You could tell that she was in love with her job as a professor and as a yoga instructor at a local studio. The midterm consisted of teaching a yoga pose, and the final was very easy!

She's super nice and not a hard class at all! We used Bearface and as long as we kept up with tracking our semester long goal and did the module activities we were fine (the textbook is on that site). Physical activity in the class was once a week for a month and was not bad at all. Only complaint is midterm and final were too unnecessarily hard.

This prof. is one of the sweetest people! There are modules that you have to do but are easy. There's also a midterm and final that are pretty hard. You also have to do physical activities in class on occasion.

Her class isn't hard but she isn't very knowledgeable. The lectures aren't very informative. They are more story-like. The midterm wasn't hard but if you didn't study, you didn't do well. The class discussions aren't really tied to the midterm/final. Her class is pretty easy but sometimes directions are unclear.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: She is so fun to listen to and informative!!! Really interactive with her lectures!
